item.description:
We will have one 202 board, which will be restricted to those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least FIVE times.

Please allow plenty of time to find parking. We will start at 2pm sharp, play until 4:30pm, and then discuss and analyze our gameplay afterward.

If the doors are locked, please enter through Ell Hall (to the right if facing Dodge Hall). You'll have to go downstairs and make a few turns through the tunnels to get into Dodge Hall, then have to come upstairs to the main lobby. May be a little challenging, but just ask around and you'll find us.

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: From main entrance, first classroom on the left
item.name: March 22 Cashflow Meetup
